scripts.build:backend: npm --workspace packages/backend run build || echo 'No build script in backend'
scripts.build:my-npm-package: npm --workspace packages/my-npm-package run build || echo 'No build script in my-npm-package'
scripts.lint:backend: npm --workspace packages/backend run lint || echo 'No lint script in backend'
scripts.deploy:contracts: npm --workspace packages/contracts run deploy || echo 'No deploy script in contracts'
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy:frontend && npm run deploy:contracts
